text: madyan nivasikalilekk avarute saheadaran su'aibine nam niyeagiccu. addeham parannu: "enre janame, ninnal allahuvin valippetuka. avanallate ninnalkkearu daivamilla. ninnal alavilum tukkattilum kuravu varuttarut. nan ninnale kanunnat susthitiyilan. ateateappam ninnaleyake valayam ceyyunna siksa ninnalkkuntakumeayenn nan bhayappetukayum ceyyunnu
